author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Bank Saint Petersburg Does Not See Geopolitical Risks, Says Holds $5 Mln In Rusal Bonds - Ifax
text:
April 19 (Reuters) - BANK SAINT PETERSBURG:
* BANK SAINT PETERSBURG DOES NOT SEE GEOPOLITICAL RISKS FOR ITSELF, CONSIDERS INVESTMENTS IN SANCTIONED RUSALâ€™S BONDS IMMATERIAL - INTERFAX CITES DEPUTY CHAIRMAN OF MANAGEMENT BOARD KONSTANTIN BALANDIN AS SAYING
* BANK SAINT PETERSBURG HAS RUSAL EUROBONDS WORTH $5 MILLION WITH MATURITY IN 2023 - INTERFAX CITES HEAD OF THE DIRECTORATE FOR OPERATIONS IN FINANCIAL MARKETS
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
